name: Willi Heeks
introduction: Willi Heeks (born 13 February 1922 and died 13 August 1996) was a German racing driver who participated in two Formula One German Grand Prix and other European non-championship races as a privateer between 1952 and 1953. He finished 6th in the non-championship 1952 Internationales Avusrennen, which was his only Formula One finish.
